meanings.definition: A person or company that renovates or restores something, especially a building or piece of furniture.
meanings.sent1: The refurbishers did a great job fixing up the old house.
meanings.sent2: The refurbishers were hired to restore the antique chair.
meanings.sent3: The refurbishers joked that they could make the old building look brand new.
meanings.sent4: The refurbishers breathed new life into the worn-out furniture.
meanings.sent5: The refurbishers transformed the dilapidated structure into a stunning masterpiece.

meanings.definition: The act of renovating or restoring something, especially a building or piece of furniture.
meanings.sent1: The refurbishers took their time with the restoration project.
meanings.sent2: The refurbishers completed the refurbishment of the historic building.
meanings.sent3: The refurbishers made the renovation process look easy.
meanings.sent4: The refurbishers' work was like a magical makeover for the old house.
meanings.sent5: The refurbishers' dedication to their craft was evident in every detail of the restoration.
